meanings.definition: A plant of the figwort family with brightly colored flowers.
meanings.sent1: The mimulus in the garden has vibrant red petals.
meanings.sent2: I planted a mimulus in my backyard for its beautiful blooms.
meanings.sent3: The mimulus seemed to be showing off its colorful flowers to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The mimulus stood out in the garden like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The bright mimulus flowers were like little bursts of happiness in the yard.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the figwort family.
meanings.sent1: The mimulus genus includes various species with unique characteristics.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the different species within the mimulus genus.
meanings.sent3: The mimulus genus was like a diverse community of floral relatives.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the mimulus genus felt like discovering a hidden treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: Each plant in the mimulus genus had its own story to tell through its blooms.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Mimulus.
meanings.sent1: I admire the mimulus for its resilience in different climates.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners appreciate the versatility of growing a mimulus.
meanings.sent3: The mimulus plant seemed to be waving hello to passersby.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of greenery, the mimulus stood out like a beacon of color.
meanings.sent5: The mimulus in the pot brightened up the room with its cheerful presence.
